subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Loui Eriksson and Landon Ferraro scored third-period goals 42 seconds apart, and Patrice Bergeron added a milestone score to help the Boston Bruins rally past the Canadiens, 3-1, in Montreal.
snippet: Loui Eriksson and Landon Ferraro scored third-period goals 42 seconds apart, and Patrice Bergeron added a milestone score to help the Boston Bruins rally past the Canadiens, 3-1, in Montreal.
